Received: from JP3884@... by imo-d09.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v27.12.) id a.6a.5ceee10 (4467) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Thu, 17 Aug 2000 08:52:50 -0400 (EDT)

Subject: Re: SAB, getting outwitted by a midget...
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    With the battle rageing on at the Ark, Adrax circles the sky like a 
hellish vulture in his demonic beast mode. The grappling gun pokes out from 
his mouth as he sees the little bots scurrying about on the surface. This 
plases him, because he could swoop down and possbile eat one of them.
    Something in the distance shines in his eyes. Its one of the Ark's 
support beams. It stands there mocking him. A challenge. If he were to knock 
the support down, the entire front of the Ark would collapse.
    "AH, I have foreseen your demise Maximals! The Ark shall be destroyed!" 
He said, his body coiling and curving like a serphant.
    Finally he swooped from the sky, his body ridged like a missle that would 
destroy the Ark. His grappling gun sent a spitfire of bullets hailing down on 
the warriors below as he got closer to the Ark. 
    Now, be neath the body of the vessle, he saw the support beam. It 
strained under the weight of the ship. Most of the others had already fallen 
or been destroyed. This was the conerstone to the Ark. And now it was Adrax's.
    He coiled his long spiked body around the support, and then began to 
squeeze like a snake would squeeze its prey. Harder and harder he could heat 
the iron graon under the pressure. Adrax began to jerk his body, pulling the 
pole in a different direction. He jerked agian, and agian. The pole began to 
become crooked. Seeing at what he had done, he slipped off the beam and took 
a look at it. Now it was bent severly. Just a little more work and it would 
collapse.

    Black Aracnia shighed as she took the Comm unit to talk into once agian. 
She picked up on Atma. "Listen, Atma. We need good warriors like yourself. 
Without you we could have never repelled the attack from the Maximals 
earlier. In fact, thats why were attacking the Ark now. To punish them. We 
are better than them, you are far superior to them Atma. Please dont leave. 
Come home, to where you belong."
